name: CAR ON A STICK
description:
Finally a great realistic game about driving to work.

Best response ever:
"Oh wow the game is actually like this, I thought your gif was broken."

Use arrows to drive.
Space to randomize road and colors.
0-9: Change colors.
QWERTYUIOP: Change Road:

Enjoy!

Music made by me in the glorious Snibbetracker!

A big THANK YOU to Simon Gustafsson for your support on this project. Without you it would never be finished.

Color inspiration and guidance for button 1: Sarofer Sertaga!
